review: Amazon took good notes from others products and came up with a winner! I highly recommend this product to have for all ages. Especially cheap games and entertainment.Good job Amazon team.

review: I love this little box so much that I purchased two of them. The voice command feature is really nice but it does not work on Netflix, it only works on Hulu. You can even say Hulu or Netflix and it will pull that up as well. The one problem that I have is that the menu button does not pull up a menu. It doesn't do anything at all. Other than that this is a great little box!
